Row.Text: The GMO Lab is a late-game building capable of creating sprawling cities, fast. It increases a city's [ICON_FOOD] Growth substantially. The city must contain a Medical Lab.

A genetically modified organism (GMO) refers to any organism whose genetic material has been altered using genetic engineering techniques. It is used as a way of replicating food sources such as corn, whilst engineering it to be resistant to detriments such as pesticides and disease.
Provides 10 [ICON_FOOD] Food in the city which it is built.
